Package online.common

Interface Summary
CanvasProtocol  
Comparable this interface is used with the implementation of quiksort.
deferredEventHandler this interface defines the visitor interface between a canvas and it's #deferredEventManager
ImageNameProvider  
InspectorInterface  
LFrameProtocol  
LobbyConstants  
OnlineConstants  
RootAppletProtocol this class defines the behavior we expect from the root applet.
SpriteProtocol The sprite protocol is a rudimentary mechanism for animating sprites across the board, with minimal interaction or effort to the game.
 

Class Summary
CachedImage this is a small utility class used by the scaled image cache.
commonChatApplet this class is the customary chat window for boardspace.
commonDisplay  
commonLFrame  
commonLobby general notes about the lobby class.
commonPanel  
commonRootApplet this is the common implementation of many things that are nominally handled by the applet root.
ConnectionManager  
deferredEventManager one of the rules for a well behaved application is that the actions resulting from buttons and menus should be handled by the main process thread rather than the AWT thread.
exCanvas Excanvas is the base class used by both the lobby and game windows.
exHashtable extended hash table.
G Class G contains "General utilities, and small static functions that any program may need.
GameInfo  
HitPoint this extension of Point is the collection point for information about the location of the mouse, and the object it points at.
InspectorBridge  
internationalStrings this class is the repository for translation strings and language support in the java applet.
IntIntHashtable A Hashtable that uses ints as the keys and values.
IntObjHashtable<OTYPE> A Hashtable that uses ints as the keys and Objects as values.
IStack this is a light weight alternate for Vector class, it is not threadsafe, and unlike vector, it has no compatibility problems with java 1.1.
loadThread  
lobbyCanvas  
MapViewer  
MD5 Borrowed from the web (thanks 1e6)
NamedObject NamedObject is a simple extension to Object, it has a user-supplied name.
netConn  
NewsReader  
OStack<T> this is a light weight replacement for Vector.
popupManager this is a replacement class to manage pop up menus.
proxySocket  
ScrollArea  
Session  
simpleObservable a simple subclass of Observable so we can call the protected method setChanged
SimpleSprite this is a mostly simple implementation of SpriteProtocol, which should be adequate for any simple requirement to drag a sprite across the screen.
Slider this is a simple widget is an extension of Rectangle that presents a changeable horizontal bar.
StockArt StockArt is a thin extension on Image, with support for loading, masking, scaling and displaying the images.
User  
 

Enum Summary
GameInfo.ES  
OnlineConstants.ConnectionState This reflects the state of the interaction with the server at the startup, and once connected and running it reflects whose turn it is to move.
SimpleSprite.Movement various acceleration profiles for sprites.
